title: Felix Typeface
content:
Can anybody help. I need a font as close to this as possible.

Cheers

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [felix\_logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100515202802/http:/typophile.com/files/felix_logo.jpg) | 14.59 KB |
author: Giles

comments.content:
You might find something here:

[http://www.sudtipos.com/home](http://web.archive.org/web/20100515202802/http:/www.sudtipos.com/home "http://www.sudtipos.com/home")

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO

Bert beat me to it. I think this looks like custom work by Angel Koziupa who does a lot of the calligraphic scripts at Sudtipos (with Ale Paul). His [Amorinda](http://web.archive.org/web/20100515202802/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/amorinda/) is quite similar, as are Malbeck and Inoxida. To me his style is all over this one.

- Mike Yanega
